channel.title: Making ur own client smaller
channel.description:
i noticed this is the help section, so this question goes to someone who is friendly to help me.
i got a client on my own for the moment, but when more then 10 people comes on the server it starts lagging real hard. someone said i need to make my client smaller, how do i make my client smaller?
thanks for you'r time

item.title: Making ur own client smaller
item.dc:creator: @Noob_Slayerz Noob Slayerz
item.description:
@Noob_Slayerz wrote:

He means your client.java… Get rid of useless stuff, unused stuff in your client.java that you don’t need. You may also have too much junk in your npcs and stuff. Or, your computer can’t handle that much people.

Read full topic
